items.title: Chaotic week for markets is a ‘textbook example of why you stick to your plan,’ financial advisors say
items.description: This week's volatility sent investors on a wild ride, but the ones who fare best in the long run have a plan and follow it.

items.title: These stocks could give investors shelter from the tariff economic slowdown, says Jefferies
items.description: In a Friday note, Jefferies identified a basket of stocks that are best positioned to hedge against the ongoing trade war.

items.title: Under-the-radar drug stock has big rebound potential here despite turmoil, says Carter Worth
items.description: Carter breaks down the charts on large-cap pharmaceutical manufacturer AbbVie.

items.title: Retail investors are running head first into this topsy-turvy market
items.description: While the stock market whipsawed over recent days, average Joe traders saw an opportunity to buy the dip.

items.title: Buy this 'resilient' credit card stock even as spending headwinds persist, says Bank of America
items.description: The firm upgraded the credit card and lending stock to buy from neutral.
